name: Minimised
description:
Game created by Juan Jose Alvarez Salinas within the Coursera specialization of Game Design and Development with Unity 2020

The game plays better on Google Chrome

The changes to the game where:

  • Creation of new environmental 3D models like the giant crystal, flowers and grass
  • Creation of new soundtracks
  • Implementation of a platform moving system
  • Implementation of a messaging display system
  • New level 3D platformer style
